General.Name: Compagnie du Bois Sauvage S.A.
General.Description: Compagnie du Bois Sauvage S.A., an investment holding company, invests in the industrial and real estate sectors in Belgium. The company was incorporated in 1957 and is headquartered in Brussels, Belgium.
General.Address: 17, Rue du Bois Sauvage, Brussels, Belgium, 1000
